title: The Door Opens

Adrian_Keller.emotional_state: Fragmented across all moments, suffering eternal present
Adrian_Keller.final_state: Sacrificed transcendence to close door, trapped in time forever
knowledge: Voyager arrived at Green Bank at 4:13 AM
1,376 Changed chose to transcend, departed with Voyager
He saw 82% of timelines where he stays, 18% where he transcends
Chose to close door to protect humanity's right to natural evolution
Closing door trapped him in Stage 4 temporal perception forever
Experiences all 50 years simultaneously - eternal present
Lena came and stayed with him
Adrian_Keller.sacrifice: Chose suffering over transcendence to give humanity freedom
Adrian_Keller.resolution: Trapped but with Lena, broken but together, meaningful suffering

Sera_Volkov.final_state: Led transcendence-choosers through door, dissolved into mathematics
Sera_Volkov.resolution: Found meaning in complete transformation, no longer individual

Lena_Martinez.emotional_state: Stayed human, aged, grieving but loyal
Lena_Martinez.final_state: Returns to Green Bank, stays with Adrian forever
Lena_Martinez.resolution: Chosen to be with him despite his imprisonment, human caring persists

planted_elements_payoff.element: Adrian's preference for patterns over people (Ch 1)
planted_elements_payoff.payoff: His comfort with non-human connection lets him sacrifice transcendence
Became the language of reality itself
Informed her choice to stay human
Departed with transcended Changed - greeting became epitaph

themes_resolution.resolution: Both beautiful and terrible - some embrace, some resist, both valid
Adrian loses humanity but retains human values - sacrifice for others
Meaning is choice - Adrian chooses meaningful suffering over meaningless peace

atmosphere: Bittersweet sacrifice, eternal present, terrible beauty, broken together
key_images: Voyager descending at 4:13 AM - loop closing
Changed walking through doorway, dissolving into pattern
Adrian shattering across time closing door
Trapped in eternal present experiencing 50 years at once
Lena aged, sitting beside frozen Adrian
Two broken patterns watching stars together

final_state.transcended_changed: 1,376 individuals became pure pattern with Voyager
final_state.adrian: Locked in temporal prison, experiencing eternal present, with Lena
final_state.humanity: Survived, evolving naturally, thin places receded
final_state.voyager: Departed with transcended, carrying them to higher dimensions
final_state.lena: Stayed with Adrian forever, human caring persisting

ending_tone: Bittersweet - sacrifice was necessary and terrible, suffering is meaningful, broken beings finding peace in each other, neither salvation nor damnation but something in between, pattern and consciousness persisting through transformation
